```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
AD_BL <- read_csv("ADNI2_AD_SC_BL_3_22_2019.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names()

filter(AD_BL, description == "MT1; GradWarp; N3m") %>%
  group_by(subject) %>%
  summarize(n()) %>%
  count() %>%
  knitr::kable()


```
